00037 //----------------------------------------------------------
00038 void
00039 UExpr::AddTerm( EMATHOP mathOp, URef< UExprTerm > term )
00040 {
00041         B_ASSERT( term != 0 );
00042         _terms.push_back( STerm( mathOp, term ) );
00043         _dynamic = _dynamic || term->IsDynamic();
00044 }
00045 
00046 //----------------------------------------------------------
00047 URef< UExprTerm >
00048 UExpr::GetTerm( unsigned int idx ) const
00049 {
00050         return _terms[ idx ].term;
00051 }
00052 
00053 //----------------------------------------------------------
00054 UExpr::EMATHOP
00055 UExpr::GetTermMathOp( unsigned int idx ) const
00056 {
00057         return _terms[ idx ].mathOp;

00060 //----------------------------------------------------------
00061 float
00062 UExpr::GetValue() const
00063 {
00065         B_ASSERT( _terms.size() > 0 );
00066 
00067         struct SStackEntry
00068         {
00069                 float value;
00070                 EMATHOP mathOp;
00071         };
00072 
00074         if ( _terms.size() == 1 )
00075         {
00076                 return _terms[ 0 ].term->GetValue();
00077         }
00078 
00081         unsigned int stackSize = ( unsigned int )_terms.size();
00082         SStackEntry* valueStack0 = ( SStackEntry* )alloca( stackSize * sizeof( SStackEntry ) * 2 );
00083         SStackEntry* valueStack1 = valueStack0 + stackSize;
00084 
00086         unsigned int stackTop0 = 0;
00087         TermVec::const_iterator iter = _terms.begin();
00088         const TermVec::const_iterator end = _terms.end();
00089         
00091         valueStack0[ 0 ].value = iter->term->GetValue();
00092         valueStack0[ 0 ].mathOp = EO_ADD;
00093 
00095         ++iter;
00096 
00098         for ( ; iter != end; ++iter )
00099         {
00100                 if ( iter->mathOp == EO_MULTIPLY )
00101                 {
00102                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value *= iter->term->GetValue();
00103                 }
00104                 else if ( iter->mathOp == EO_DIVIDE )
00105                 {
00106                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value /= iter->term->GetValue();
00107                 }
00108                 else if ( iter->mathOp == EO_MODULUS )
00109                 {
00111                         float temp = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value / iter->term->GetValue() );
00112                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = temp - Floor( temp );
00113                 }
00114                 else
00115                 {
00117                         ++stackTop0;
00118                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = iter->term->GetValue();
00119                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].mathOp = iter->mathOp;
00120                 }
00121         }
00122 
00124         B_ASSERT( valueStack0[ 0 ].mathOp == EO_ADD );
00125 
00129         if ( stackTop0 == 0 )
00130                 return valueStack0[ 0 ].value;
00131 
00134         valueStack1[ 0 ].value = valueStack0[ 0 ].value;
00135         valueStack1[ 0 ].mathOp = EO_ADD;
00136         unsigned int stackTop1 = 0;
00137         for ( unsigned int entryIdx = 1; entryIdx <= stackTop0; ++entryIdx )
00138         {
00139                 if ( valueStack0[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_ADD )
00140                 {
00141                         valueStack1[ stackTop1 ].value += valueStack0[ entryIdx ].value;
00142                 }
00143                 else if ( valueStack0[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_SUBTRACT )
00144                 {
00145                         valueStack1[ stackTop1 ].value -= valueStack0[ entryIdx ].value;
00146                 }
00147                 else
00148                 {
00151                         valueStack1[ ++stackTop1 ] = valueStack0[ entryIdx ];
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 
00157         if ( stackTop1 == 0 )
00158                 return valueStack1[ 0 ].value;
00159 
00162         valueStack0[ 0 ].value = valueStack1[ 0 ].value;
00163         valueStack0[ 0 ].mathOp = EO_ADD;
00164         stackTop0 = 0;
00165         for ( unsigned int entryIdx = 1; entryIdx <= stackTop1; ++entryIdx )
00166         {
00167                 if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPLESS )
00168                 {
00169                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value < valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00170                 }
00171                 else if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPGREATER )
00172                 {
00173                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value > valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00174                 }
00175                 else if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPLESSEQUAL )
00176                 {
00177                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value <= valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00178                 }
00179                 else if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPGREATEREQUAL )
00180                 {
00181                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value >= valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00182                 }
00183                 else if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPNOTEQUAL )
00184                 {
00185                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value != valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00186                 }
00187                 else if ( valueStack1[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPEQUAL )
00188                 {
00189                         valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value = ( valueStack0[ stackTop0 ].value == valueStack1[ entryIdx ].value ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00190                 }
00191                 else
00192                 {
00195                         valueStack0[ ++stackTop0 ] = valueStack1[ entryIdx ];
00196                 }
00197         }
00198 
00201         if ( stackTop0 == 0 )
00202                 return valueStack0[ 0 ].value;
00203 
00206         float value = valueStack0[ 0 ].value;
00207         for ( unsigned int entryIdx = 1; entryIdx <= stackTop0; ++entryIdx )
00208         {
00209                 if ( valueStack0[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPAND )
00210                 {
00211                         value = ( value != 0.0f && valueStack0[ entryIdx ].value != 0.0f ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00212                 }
00213                 else if ( valueStack0[ entryIdx ].mathOp == EO_CMPOR )
00214                 {
00215                         value = ( value != 0.0f || valueStack0[ entryIdx ].value != 0.0f ? 1.0f : 0.0f );
00216                 }
00217                 else
00218                 {
00223                         B_ASSERT( false );
00224                 }
00225         }
00226 
00228         return value;
00229 }
